Dear all,

 

Hope you’re all well,

please be informed that the Dyson Riyadh Park store is scheduled to be handed over on the 9th of May 2025, we need to ensure that everything is ready by that time.

 

For that, we need to start a stream, with people in this email to get timely updates on the opening status, Based on this notification, we are counting on your support and prompt action as usual  

  

@Hamzal Eduvammal <mailto:Hamzal.Eduvammal@chalhoub.com> @Tahseen Ali <mailto:Tahseen.Ali@chalhoub.com> 

Kindly make sure all needed IT equipment are installed & ready as per the received notification, the store code is 71309

  

Hi @Fetoun Alahmadi <mailto:Fetoun.Alahmadi@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Al-Qarafi <mailto:Ahmed.Alqarafi@chalhoub.com>  kindly share the CR for Dyson Riyadh Park   

 

 

@Humedi Suliman <mailto:Humedi.Alrawali@chalhoub.com> 

Kindly need your support in making sure the below is done with the service provider

 

*	Service agreement of Intrusion Alarm System is commissioned and signed
*	Service agreement for fire extinguishers is commissioned and signed  
*	First aid kit to be sent 
*	Fire extinguishers 

 

@Majed Alassaf <mailto:Majed.Alassaf@chalhoub.com> @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  kindly ensure the CCTV is connected with the control room

Please need your support with the below points in preparation for the opening,

*	Kindly share a list of the store team whenever it’s available (specifying the name & employee ID ) so we can arrange for POS /Siocs training as well as requesting POS / Siocs access for them

Hi Cheryl, 

 

Trust this email finds you well and Happy New Year too!

 

Rest assured, RSO is here to fully support and advise you in every step of the store opening process. ! Regarding the preparations for the store opening, it may still be too early to begin communication with everyone involved at this stage, however, I will start coordinating with all relevant departments and individuals to ensure there are no delays, particularly with the Admin team in expediting the store CR issuance to be able us to issue all legal documents required for the store  

 

As previously discussed, it is crucial for us to receive the store receipt date from the 3D team to initiate the required actions by all stakeholders. Additionally, ensuring the availability of the store code is equally important for seamless progress.
